    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

import pandas as pd
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import plotly as py
import plotly.express as px
import plotly.graph_objs as go
from plotly.offline import init_notebook_mode, iplot, plot
source.a0f49361:
#grafik scatter pengeluaran perkapita indonesia tahun 2007-2018

fig1 = px.scatter(dataL, x="Year", y="kapita", color="Year")
fig1.update_layout(
    title_text='Pengeluaran Perkapita Indonesia (2007-2018)')

fig1.show()
source.5df52c1a:
# grafik line pengeluaran perkapita indonesia tahun 2007-2018 (optional)
trace1 = go.Scatter(
                    x = dataL.Year,
                    y = dataL.kapita,
                    mode = "lines",
                    name = "citations",
                    marker = dict(color = 'rgba(16, 112, 2, 0.8)'),
                    text= dataL.Year)
data = [trace1]
layout = dict(title_text='Pengeluaran Perkapita Indonesia (2007-2018)',
              xaxis= dict(title= 'Year',ticklen= 5,zeroline= False),yaxis= dict(title= 'Pengeluaran Perkapita',ticklen= 5,zeroline= False)
             )
fig2 = dict(data = data, layout = layout)
iplot(fig2)

#grafik scatter konsumsi litrik perkapita indonesia tahun 2007-2018 
fig3 = px.scatter(dataL, x="Year", y="MWH/kapita", color="Year")
fig3.update_layout(title_text='Konsumsi Listrik per kapita dalam MWH (2007-2018)')

fig3.show()
source.d210c4c8:
#grafik line pengeluaran perkapita indonesia tahun 2007-2018 (optional)
trace1 = go.Scatter(
                    x = dataL.Year,
                    y = dataL['MWH/kapita'],
                    mode = "lines",
                    name = "citations",
                    marker = dict(color = 'rgba(16, 112, 2, 0.8)'),
                    text= dataL.Year)
data = [trace1]
layout = dict(title_text='Konsumsi Listrik per kapita dalam MWH (2007-2018)',
              xaxis= dict(title= 'Year',ticklen= 5,zeroline= False),yaxis= dict(title= 'MWH/kapita',ticklen= 5,zeroline= False)
             )
             
fig4 = dict(data = data, layout = layout)
iplot(fig4)
source.2f0cbd27:
#Linear Regression antara konsumsi Listrik dengan Pengeluaran Perkapita (2007-2018)

fig5 = px.scatter(dataL, x="kapita", y="MWH/kapita", trendline="ols", color="Year",trendline_color_override='Brown')
fig5.update_layout(title_text='Linear Regression antara konsumsi Listrik dengan Pengeluaran Perkapita (2007-2018)')

fig5.show()
results = px.get_trendline_results(fig5)
results.px_fit_results.iloc[0].summary()
